description:
Simone hears a rumor that Kanako is actually using the Cybodies for her own personal gain. In her quest to topple Kanako, Simone offers the use of her own Cybody, Daletos, to Takashi, and goes into battle against Takuto.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cyber Body no Shiteki Katsuyou Jutsu
サイバディの私的活用術
